Good Day,

A friend and I thought up what we feel would be a rather awesome Cinematic. Either to be used when Career mode launches (as a promo vid), or a cutscene during Career Mode.

Recreate John F. Kennedy's Moon Speech. With Kerbals. Speaking Kerblish.

It.

Will.

Be.

Awesome.

Now I think that I would enjoy seeing it, if only for the JFK hair... I don't know why I said that, but if there was some kind of grotesque parody of the cold war behind the start of KSP, I could get behind that.

What I always thought would be cool is an optional cutscene of the VAB doors opening and a crawler taking your ship out to the launch pad or maybe a ground vehicle taxiing your plane out to the runway when you launch a craft.
I like that idea 0jam. I think you should post that in a new topic so the devs see it. Could really make for an engrossing experience. Make it like the NASA crawler, just as slow too.
